story_parts.text: The guy had always wanted to go to candy land. He had heard so many stories about the amazing candy there. Finally, he took the plunge and went on an adventure to candy land. He was not disappointed. The candy was everything he had imagined and more. He ate so much candy that he got a sugar high and had to be carried out of candy land. It was a great adventure and he vowed to come back again.

next_options.0: The guy comes back to candy land and eats even more candy
next_options.1: The guy gets sick of candy and decides to never come back

story_parts.text: The guy gets sick of candy and decides to never come back. He finds that the constant sugar high is too much for him and that he doesn't enjoy feeling sick all the time.

next_options.0: The guy decides to find a new hobby that doesn't involve eating candy
next_options.1: The guy decides to eat healthier foods and cut candy out of his diet altogether

story_parts.text: The guy decides to eat healthier foods and cut candy out of his diet altogether. He finds that he feels much better without all the sugar and that he enjoys the challenge of eating healthier. He still thinks about candy sometimes, but he knows that it's not good for him and that he doesn't need it in his life.

next_options.0: The guy continues to eat healthy and feels great, but he starts to crave candy more and more
next_options.1: The guy continues to eat healthy and feels great

story_parts.text: The guy continues to eat healthy and feels great, but he starts to crave candy more and more.He starts to think about it all the time and wonders if maybe he should have just a little bit.He tries to resist, but eventually gives in and has a piece of candy. he feels guilty afterwards, but tells himself that it's not a big deal and that he can control his intake.He continues to eat healthy most of the time, but allows himself the occasional treat of candy.

next_options.0: The guy finds himself eating more and more candy, and starts to feel like he's out of control
next_options.1: The guy finds himself eating more and more candy, but tells himself that it's not a big deal

story_parts.text: The guy finds himself eating more and more candy, but tells himself that it's not a big deal. He says that he can control his intake and that he's not addicted to candy. However, the guy finds that he's eating candy more and more often and starts to feel guilty about it. He knows that it's not good for him, but he can't seem to stop himself. next_options.0: The guy tries to cut back on candy, but finds it difficult and eventually gives up
next_options.1: The guy is able to successfully cut back on candy and is proud of himself

options.1: The sick feeling all the time
options.3: The decision to never come back

options.1: He decides to cut back on the candy, but finds it difficult
options.2: He completely gives up candy and doesn't eat it anymore
